name: Root Beer Butterfest Float
description: This low-alcohol, post-dinner drink tastes a bit like a root beer float after the ice cream has melted. It is named after the Butter Festival that takes place every June in Mr. Bartels’s hometown, Reedsburg, Wis. If you have a butter cookie or vanilla wafer on hand, it makes a nice accompaniment.
keywords: club soda, Kringle Cream, Root liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: Into a Collins glass filled with ice, pour Kringle Cream and Root liqueur and top with club soda. Stir briefly. Add straw.
